c:attribute.name: alertstate
c:attribute.description: Reflects the current state of the weather radio (alerting, no existing alert, or an existing hushed alert).

c:attribute.name: playingstate
c:attribute.description: Reflects whether the weather radio is currently playing or is quiet.

c:attribute.name: currentalert
c:attribute.description: EAS code for current alert (three letter strings). Set to NONE when no alert is active. Set to UNKNOWN when a code not currently known is sent.

c:attribute.name: lastalerttime
c:attribute.description: UTC date time of last alert start time. Note if alert changes (county list or duration), timestamp will be updated.

c:attribute.name: alertsofinterest
c:attribute.description: List of EAS alert codes the user wishes to be notifed of (three letter strings).

c:attribute.name: location
c:attribute.description: Six digit S.A.M.E. code for locations published by NOAA.

c:method.name: ScanStations
c:method.description: Scans all stations to determine which can be heard.

c:return.name: stations
c:return.description: The list of stations discovered during the scan, like [ {'id':1, 'freq':'106.240 MHz', 'rssi':-67.0}, ... ]

c:method.name: PlayStation
c:method.description: Play selected station to allow user to select amongst the options.

c:parameter.name: station
c:parameter.description: The ID of the station to play (1-7)

c:parameter.name: time
c:parameter.description: Timeout in seconds after which player will stop (-1 to play forever)

c:method.name: SelectStation
c:method.description: Select station as the one Halo will use.

c:parameter.name: station
c:parameter.description: The ID of the station to use (1-7)
